sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Centralize logs, metrics, and traces with durable ingestion, enrichment, storage tiers, and actionable alerting.

sections.title: Signals & Ingestion
sections.content: Structured logs (JSON), metrics (RED/USE), distributed traces (W3C). Agents/OTel collectors; backpressure and buffering.

sections.title: Retention & Costs
sections.content: Hot/warm/cold tiers; sampling strategies; index lifecycle; cost caps and budgeting with usage SLOs.

sections.title: Dashboards & Alerting
sections.content: Golden dashboards for services; SLO-based alerts; noise reduction and runbook links.

sections.title: Privacy & Redaction
sections.content: PII scrubbing at source; tokenization; access controls; audit trails and data retention compliance.
